info.name: CSU Chico - Marc's Dark Theme
info.description:
A Darker Theme for Chico States Website.

Chico's CSS naming is SUPER inconsistent from page to page.
If I missed anything please leave a comment/feedback and I'll update it.
- Please leave the URL of the page, at the least
info.additionalInfo:
Update 04/13/18
- Changed some backgrounds in BBL main page.
- Change some text link colors in Portal (will probably change later, not a huge fan of the new color)
- Current Image displayed mini thumbnail on Home page now has a lighter border when selected and is more opaque to make it more obvious which picture is being displayed

Update 2/14/17
Updated yellow border background color on portal site, along with several text color changes on the portal. 

Update 12/21/17
Updated Table Background color, and text color for Teacher Details in the Campus Directory

Update 11/02/17
Updated Portal Login page. Both the page before you sign in, and the page you sign in on. 

Update 10/18/17
Updating theme name to replace old theme which will be deleted. 

Update 09/13/17
Complete rewrite of skin. Pages are more consistent
Includes: 
- Homepage and other main pages
- CSCI page
- Library (Main page and Search page)
- Directory
